abstract: Bank of America shuffled its top management on Wednesday afternoon, replacing its chief risk officer and starting a search for a new chief financial officer, as Brian T. Moynihan, the new chief executive, moved to put his team in place at the bank.
snippet: Bank of America shuffled its top management on Wednesday afternoon, replacing its chief risk officer and starting a search for a new chief financial officer, as Brian T. Moynihan, the new chief executive, moved to put his team in place at the bank...
lead_paragraph: Bank of America shuffled its top management on Wednesday afternoon, replacing its chief risk officer and starting a search for a new chief financial officer, as Brian T. Moynihan, the new chief executive, moved to put his team in place.

headline.main: Bank of America Shuffles Its Top Management
